tikoot.lauri.ddcc

Class DDCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tikoot.lauri.ddcc.DDCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DDCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by LaglessLlama on 26.3.18. DDCharacter stores and handles all the necessary information of a created character.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addLanguage

        public void addLanguage(java.lang.String side,
                        java.lang.String... langs)
        Method adds languages to Lists. There are two options to use: - "racial" for langauges determined by Race - "other" for other sources Super special languages like Druidic are not included.
        Parameters:
        side - the list you want to add language to
        langs - languages you want to add

      • addRandomLanguages

        public void addRandomLanguages(java.lang.String side,
                               int amount)
        Method adds random languages to specified list.
        Parameters:
        side - list of languages you want to add to
        amount - amount of languages you want to randomize

      • randomLanguage

        Returns:
        randomized language

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(int level)
        Method sets the level of character. Attribute increases are not included currenctly.
        Parameters:

      • getProficiency

        public int getProficiency()
        Method returns the proficiency bonus determined by level.
        Returns:

      • setProficiency

        public void setProficiency()
        Method sets the proficiency bonus. Bonus starts from level one and increases by one every fourth level (excluding first stage at levels 1 to 4).

      • getAttributes

        public int[][] getAttributes()
        Method returns attributes in two dimensional array. Array holds score and modifier of attributes.
        Returns:
        attributes in 2d array

      • getAttribute

        public int getAttribute(int i)
        Method returns specified attribute score (not the modifier).
        Parameters:
        i - index of attribute wanted
        Returns:
        attribute score

      • setAttributes

        public void setAttributes(int[][] attributes)
        Method sets array of attributes.
        Parameters:
        attributes - 2D array of values

      • randomizeAttributes

        public void randomizeAttributes()
        Method randomizes attributes with formula given by Player's Handbook: - Roll four d6 dice and take the smallest roll out of the result.

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(java.lang.String attr,
                         int score)
        Method sets specified attribute to specified score. Method uses abbreviations of attributes.
        Parameters:
        attr - attribute you want to set
        score - score you want

        Method sets given attribute save.
        Parameters:

      • randomizeSkillsByClass

        public void randomizeSkillsByClass(java.lang.String cls)
        Method randomly picks skills by class. Each class has a specific pool of skills to choose from.
        Parameters:
        cls - class you want to randomize by
